Topic.Title: How to Send Game in an Email

Posts.EditableText: Hello! I'm very new to Quest and will likely be posting here a lot for help. I recently made a demo for my game (it's a gamebook game if that matters) and would like to send the demo to someone via email without publishing the game anywhere. Is there an easy way to do this?
Posts.HTML: Hello! I'm very new to Quest and will likely be posting here a lot for help. I recently made a demo for my game (it's a gamebook game if that matters) and would like to send the demo to someone via email without publishing the game anywhere. Is there an easy way to do this?

Posts.EditableText:
Hm, while I wouldn't recommend sending an unpublished version to someone you don't fully 100% trust, what I tend to do is compile everything they will need into a compressed zipfile.

1) Take your game and software Quest 5.8 
2) Put them beside one another and highlight together.
3) Right click and SEND TO Compressed Zip File. 
4) Send Zip File via email. 

Hope that helps!

Anonynn.

Posts.EditableText: I also want to know how to send a game via email. My email is on AOL mail. Some months before I tried to send my game via email but it was not succeded, rather an error has occurred and for that error, I couldn't log in to my account. After visiting many sites I found the solution from and resolved the AOL mail error. Now I wanted to know in which way I can send my game via email without the occurrence of any error?
